plot outline: When Mahesh requests Anand to cover for him and make a pizza delivery, he doesn't know that he was actually sending Anand to meet the love of his life. When Anand gives a ride to Prasad on his way he did not know that he would bump into the hate of his life, whom he would eventually marry, divorce and remarry. When Mahesh got Anand to cover for him and went to break up with his girlfriend he did not know that he would become the object of a gay man's obsession. These three stories crisply criss-cross each other towards a final scenario of all is well that ends well.
title: Nuvvila
plot: Three boys who work at a pizza store are thrown into three different stories when one boy had to cover for another boy and make a delivery.

When Mahesh requests Anand to cover for him and make a pizza delivery, he doesn't know that he was actually sending Anand to meet the love of his life. When Anand gives a ride to Prasad on his way he did not know that he would bump into the hate of his life, whom he would eventually marry, divorce and remarry. When Mahesh got Anand to cover for him and went to break up with his girlfriend he did not know that he would become the object of a gay man's obsession. These three stories crisply criss-cross each other towards a final scenario of all is well that ends well.::Deepak Alone
